title.rendered: BASIC EDDIE BENJAMIN COVER RELEASE PARTY

content.rendered:
24Fashion TV had the pleasure to attend New BASIC cover of #Rebirth Issue, featuring singer and songwriter Eddie Benjamin

BASIC Magazine threw an incredible intimate party themed RODEO NIGHT to celebrate an exclusive art cover release starring a talented young musician, singer and songwriter Eddie Benjamin. Eddie had arrived with his beautiful girlfriend Maddie Ziegler and partied till after midnight with his closest friends. The event took place at the hottest venue in Hollywood the Poppy, where accompanied by the heartening applause, Eddie revealed his BASIC cover of #Rebirth Issue. The night was full of pleasant surprises, the fashionably-chic crowd was pumping under the charms of our dangerously attractive DJ Archie the DJ. BASIC Magazine Editor-in-Chief Viktorija Pashuta & BASIC Partner & CFO Jackson Chong thank all of the guests, who attended the event.

New BASIC cover of #Rebirth Issue, featuring singer and songwriter Eddie Benjamin

24Fashion TV Chief-Editor/Co-founder Galina Antonova

BASIC Magazine Editor-in-Chief Viktorija Pashuta
August Getty, Gigi Gorgeous, Nats Getty, Hilary Montez and Marsha Molinari

Guests celebrating the New BASIC cover of #Rebirth

Eddie Benjamin and BASIC magazine CFO Jackson Chong

Actress Carolina De Athey and 24FashionTV Chief-editor Galina Antonova

Guests arriving to Rodeo Night Basic magazine release party

Guests arriving to Rodeo Night Basic magazine release party

Actress Carolina De Athey and 24FashionTV Chief-editor Galina Antonova

A guest and BASIC Magazine Editor-in-Chief Viktorija Pashuta

BASIC Magazine Editor-in-Chief Viktorija Pashuta with guests


PHOTOGRAPHERS Tomorrow Mingtian @tomorrow2046

Nestor @2uduri and Tony Perez 

CFO & PRODUCER Jackson Chong @jacksonchong_

EDITOR-IN-CHIEF Viktorija Pashuta @viktorija_pashuta

CREATIVE DIRECTION Oye Decova @xic_province

MODELS Trinity @trinplr, Laura Dennis @lauradennis__, Olya Voronova @olyaraven

STYLIST #KimShereeStyles @thetrendhaus

DJ Archie @archiewhatsthemove

ASSISTANT TO EIC Alice @alicelechi

INTERNS Monica Samuel @monixsam and Olivia Amezcua @oliviaxisabella

LOCATION Poppy @poppy
